titleStmt.title: A sermon of fasting, and of Lent, and of the antiquitie, dignitie, and great necessitie thereof preached vpon the 14. of Februarie, anno 1607 at Shaftesbury / by Io. Mayo.
titleStmt.author: Mayo, John K.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Hall, for John Helme, and are to bee sold at his shop, in S. Dunstones Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped and torn, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop, in S. Dunstones Church-yard
